name: Locomotive Lookout!
description:
Do your best to stay on track in this wild rail-riding game! CONTROLS:

X - switch rails

R - restart

Credits

Submitted for the NOKIA 3310 Jam 3:

https://itch.io/jam/nokiajam3

All art is my own, aside from Sound Effects and Fonts, provided in the Game Jam's resources page:
SFX are by Trix https://twitter.com/Trixelized
Fonts are by somepx https://somepx.itch.io/

Developer High Score: 126
